mistOnAdd:
Both sides became
shrouded in mist!

shrouded in mist!

shrouded in mist!

Both sides are no longer
protected by mist!

Your team is no longer
protected by mist!
mistOnRemoveEnemy:
The opposing team is no longer
protected by mist!

stronger against physical moves!

stronger against physical moves!

matBlockOnAdd:
{{pokemonNameWithAffix}} intends to flip up a mat
and block incoming attacks!
matBlockApply: {{attackName}} was blocked by the kicked-up mat!

team from critical hits!

noCritOnRemoveEnemy:

have faded.
waterSportOnRemove:

have faded.
plasmaFistsOnAdd: A deluge of ions showers the battlefield!

The twisted dimensions
returned to normal!
wonderRoomOnAdd:
It created a bizarre area in which
Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped!
wonderRoomOnRemove: Wonder Room wore off, and Defense and Sp. Def stats returned to normal!

The Tailwind blew from behind
your team!
tailwindOnAddEnemy:
The Tailwind blew from behind
the opposing team!

happyHourOnAdd: Everyone is caught up in the happy atmosphere!
safeguardOnAdd: The whole field is cloaked in a mystical veil!

safeguardOnAddEnemy: The opposing team cloaked itself in a mystical veil!

fireGrassPledgeOnRemoveEnemy: The sea of fire around the opposing team disappeared!
fireGrassPledgeLapse: {{pokemonNameWithAffix}} was hurt by the sea of fire!
waterFirePledgeOnAdd: A rainbow appeared in the sky!
waterFirePledgeOnAddPlayer: A rainbow appeared in the sky on your team’s side!
waterFirePledgeOnAddEnemy: A rainbow appeared in the sky on the opposing team’s side!
waterFirePledgeOnRemovePlayer: The rainbow on your team's side disappeared!
waterFirePledgeOnRemoveEnemy: The rainbow on the opposing team's side disappeared!
grassWaterPledgeOnAddEnemy: A swamp enveloped the opposing team!
grassWaterPledgeOnRemovePlayer: The swamp around your team disappeared!
grassWaterPledgeOnRemoveEnemy: The swamp around the opposing team disappeared!
fairyLockOnAdd: No one will be able to run away during the next turn!
neutralizingGasOnRemove: The effects of the neutralizing gas wore off!
